error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
templateStringsWithTypeErrorInFunctionExpressionsInSubstitutionExpressionES6.ts(1,27): error TS2322: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'number'.

==== templateStringsWithTypeErrorInFunctionExpressionsInSubstitutionExpressionES6.ts (1 errors) ====
    `${function (x: number) { x = "bad"; } }`;

!!! error TS2322: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'number'.
